General.Name: Elektrocieplownia Bedzin
General.Description: EC Bedzin S.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of electricity and heat in Poland. It operates in two segments, Energy and Financial. The company produces electricity and heat through conventional sources; and steam and hot water. It also provides leasing and other financial services. The company was formerly known as Elektrocieplownia Bedzin S.A. and changed its name to EC Bedzin S.A. in August 2023. EC Bedzin S.A. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Poznan, Poland.
